schema.title: Token
schema.description: Set a new Andromeda Token ADO.

decimals.title: Decimal positions for Token
decimals.description: The number of decimals to be used for the token.

initial_balances.title: Starting Balances
initial_balances.description: Used to initiate balances for addresses. Contains an address and the amount of tokens for that address.

minter.title: Minter
minter.ui:help: The address to assign as a minter.

cap.title: Supply Cap
cap.ui:help: A hard cap on total supply that can be achieved by minting. !The cap refers to the total supply. If None, there is unlimited cap.

project.title: Project URL
project.description: A URL pointing to the project behind this token.

description.title: Token Description
description.description: A longer description of the token and it's utility. Designed for tooltips or such.

marketing.title: Authorized Marketing Address
marketing.description: The address (if any) who can update this data structure.

logo-label.title: Token Logo
logo-label.description: !This section needs to be moved to logo once title/description display is resolved for type anyof/oneof!

logo.title: Token Logo
logo.description: !End Loaded Description from LOGO object (No title displayed)! This is used for uploading logo data, or setting it in InstantiateData

oneOf.title: Externally Hosted
oneOf.description: A reference to an externally hosted logo. Must be a valid HTTP or HTTPS URL.

url.title: Logo URL
url.description: A reference to an externally hosted logo. Must be a valid HTTP or HTTPS URL.

oneOf.title: Stored on Chain
oneOf.description: Logo content stored on the blockchain. !Enforce maximum size of 5KB on all variants!

embedded.description: This is used to store the logo on the blockchain in an accepted format. Enforce maximum size of 5KB on all variants.

oneOf.title: Logo as SVG
oneOf.description: Store the Logo as an SVG file. !The content must conform to the specifications at https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Scalable_Vector_Graphics (The contract should do some light-weight sanity-check validation)!

svg.title: SVG File to Store
svg.description:
Binary is a wrapper around Vec<u8> to add base64 de/serialization with serde. It also adds some helper methods to help encode inline.

This is only needed as serde-json-{core,wasm} has a horrible encoding for Vec<u8>

oneOf.title: Logo as PNG
oneOf.description: Store the Logo as a PNG file. !This will likely only support up to 64x64 or so within the 5KB limit.!

png.title: PNG File to Store
png.description:
Binary is a wrapper around Vec<u8> to add base64 de/serialization with serde. It also adds some helper methods to help encode inline.

This is only needed as serde-json-{core,wasm} has a horrible encoding for Vec<u8>
